channel.title: Public int and public void question

item.title: Public int and public void question
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

i have a public int called

public int itemType(int item) {
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.capes.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.capes[i]) {
			return playerCape;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.hats.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.hats[i]) {
			return playerHat;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.boots.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.boots[i]) {
			return playerFeet;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.gloves.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.gloves[i]) {
			return playerHands;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.shields.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.shields[i]) {
			return playerShield;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.amulets.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.amulets[i]) {
			return playerAmulet;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.arrows.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.arrows[i]) {
			return playerArrows;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.rings.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.rings[i]) {
			return playerRing;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.body.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.body[i]) {
			return playerChest;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < Item.legs.length; i++) {
		if(item == Item.legs[i]) {
			return playerLegs;
		}
	}

	//Default
	return playerWeapon;
}

if i wanted to add that int into a certain area so that will take effect, how would i add it in? would i need a public void including the int? if you know how i would make this so a certain area would have this, please tell me how to or explain it. if i need a void could you explain that for me please? thank you

using pimpscape source if important. i wanted to add this to duel arena so you would keep items if you die. thank you

Read full topic
